verses.name: Mark 1:35
verses.text: And in the morning, rising up a great while before day, he went out, and departed into a solitary place, and there prayed.

verses.name: Mark 1:36
verses.text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him.

verses.name: Mark 1:37
verses.text: And when they had found him, they said unto him, All men seek for thee.

verses.name: Mark 1:38
verses.text: And he said unto them, Let us go into the next towns, that I may preach there also: for therefore came I forth.

verses.name: Mark 1:39
verses.text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee, and cast out devils.
